settings.select: 'send' as SrcBillType, A.BillNo as SrcBillNo, A.RowId as SrcRowId, A.Unit, A.UnitPrice as SrcUnitPrice, A.Num as SrcNum, C.MaterialCode, C.MaterialName, C.MaterialType, C.Model, C.Material, C.LimitLevel, C.ManageLevel
settings.from: mms_sendDetail A left join mms_send B on B.BillNo = A.BillNo left join mms_material C on C.MaterialCode = A.MaterialCode
